snippet: The new rules, which will apply to people who travel across the 28-member bloc, are accompanied by regulations on so-called net neutrality.
abstract: European officials approve new rules on how mobile and wired Internet will work in 28-member European Union; regulations are viewed as version of net neutrality.
lead_paragraph: The new rules, which will apply to people who travel across the 28-member bloc, are accompanied by regulations on so-called net neutrality.

headline.main: E.U. to End Cellphone Roaming Charges in 2017
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; European Officials Set Rules to Nurture Digital Commerce
